mapper.update:
update JP_GQD_CJR
GQDH = #{gqdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TKNO = #{tkno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHBH = #{shbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCDH = #{xcdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXH = #{sxh,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CJRLX = #{cjrlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJR = #{cjr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJHM = #{sjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GQ_XSFY = #{gqXsfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GQ_CGFY = #{gqCgfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XB = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJYXQ = #{zjyxq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJQFG = #{zjqfg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and shbh = #{shbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
